title: Fix My Country Project
contentPreview: A child project of Wikitruth to bring good change to a country where it is implemented. Originally intended as a standalone project, but due to its high dependency to Wikitruth's core features, it was decided that it will be merged as a child project...
content:
A child project of Wikitruth to bring good change to a country where it is implemented. Originally intended as a standalone project, but due to its high dependency to Wikitruth's core features, it was decided that it will be merged as a child project or an extension.

The first pilot country targetted is the Philippines, i.e. Fix The Philippines (fixthephilippines.org).
